snippet: The clock ticking and a season filled with promise evaporating, Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger took the snap, turned to his left and put the AFC North title in the hands of Antonio Brown....
lead_paragraph: The clock ticking and a season filled with promise evaporating, Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger took the snap, turned to his left and put the AFC North title in the hands of Antonio Brown.

headline.main: Steelers Win AFC North After Rallying Past Ravens 31-27
headline.print_headline: Steelers Win AFC North After Rallying Past Ravens 31-27
